sentences.en: Bishop Daly said he was devastated by news of the Cardinal's death.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教说他听到红衣主教去世的消息后感到极为震惊和难过。

sentences.en: Cardinal Daly has said that churches should not be used for profane or secular purposes.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教已经说过，教堂不应该用于非宗教或世俗的目的。

sentences.en: Cardinal de Bricassart chartered a private plane to Athens.
sentences.cn: 德?布里卡撒特红衣大主教获得特许乘坐一架私人飞机去雅典.

sentences.en: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentences.cn: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentences.en: Harmony, balance and order are cardinal virtues to the French.
sentences.cn: 和谐、平衡、秩序是法国人最看重的三项基本美德。

sentences.en: Having clean hands is one of the cardinal rules when preparing food.
sentences.cn: 双手洁净是准备食物时的一项最基本要求。

sentences.en: He committed the cardinal sin of criticizing his teammates.
sentences.cn: 他犯了指责队友的大错。

sentences.en: His Eminence Cardinal Hume celebrated Mass.
sentences.cn: 休谟红衣主教大人主持了弥撒。

sentences.en: I committed the physician's cardinal sin: I got involved with my patients.
sentences.cn: 我犯了从医的大忌：跟病人有了感情纠葛。

sentences.en: In 1448, Nicholas was appointed a cardinal.
sentences.cn: 1448年，尼古拉斯被任命为红衣主教。

sentences.en: Infection remains a cardinal problem in the treatment of burns.
sentences.cn: 在烧伤治病中,感染仍然是中心问题.

sentences.en: Respect for life is a cardinal principle of English law.
sentences.cn: 尊重生命是英国法律最重要的原则。
红衣主教感到恼火,脸涨得通红.

sentences.en: They were encouraged by a promise from Cardinal Winning.
sentences.cn: 红衣主教温宁的许诺使他们受到鼓舞。

sentences.en: This is a matter of cardinal significance.

trans.tran_en: a priest of high rank in the Roman Catholic Church
